isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - ELECTRIC SEATS

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC SEATS
svcproc.para: Voltage is present at (J1) junction block, red wire, (490) seat inline fuse, and circuit M1WHT. With power passenger seat, voltage is also present at circuit M2WHT1 and connector (492). The ground path for the passenger seat is through connector (492), circuit M2 BLK1, connector (491), and circuit M1 BLK to cab ground. The ground path for the driver seat is just connector (491) and circuit M1 BLK to cab ground. The seats contain the switch circuits, switches, and motors, and are not discussed in the manual.
